title: PM Modi flags off India's first automobile in-plant Railway siding project
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi inaugurated India's first automobile in-plant railway siding project of Maruti Suzuki India in Hansalpur, Gujarat. He also laid the foundation stone for railway projects worth â‚¹85,000 crore, including the launch of 10 new Vande Bharat trains. Maruti Suzuki plans to build similar facilities in Manesar and Kharkhoda.
